FLife

  • Version: 3.3.1
  • Date: 2018-07-25
  • Author: Laurence Kell
  • Maintainer: Laurence Kell laurie@seaplusplus.co.uk
  • Repository: https://github.com/flr/FLife/
  • Bug reports: https://github.com/flr/FLife/issues

Overview

Methods for Modelling Life History Traits

To install this package, start R and enter: install.packages(“FLife”, repos=“http:///flr-project.org/R”)

or download from the FLife releases page
